description: Details of condition 24B (District Heating) submitted pursuant to planning permission 00616/F/P21 dated 08/12/2017 for variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow an increase in the floor area of both the cinema by 1,141sqm (GEA) and retail by 1369sqm (GEA), one additional residential unit and alterations to the fenestration, elevational detailing, massing, and layout and positioning of blocks, to remove condition 17 (waste) and to amend the description to "Demolition of commercial and residential properties, site clearance and redevelopment comprising the construction of a mixed-use development comprising private and affordable residential units, a multiscreen cinema, commercial floorspace, infrastructure including parking spaces, cycle parking spaces, service areas, public realm incorporating pedestrian/cycle circulation areas with associated hard and soft landscaping and private amenity spaces of planning permission 00616/F/P20 approved 13/03/2017
